title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Higher-Order Thinking Skills for Gifted Language Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Language proficiency at or above secondary education level and basic academic inquiry experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex textual content to establish creative problem-solving strategies

Learners can analyze 10 language data samples (text/voice) with 3–4 team members using digital collaboration tools like Google Docs or Miro and submit a draft argument design including logical reasoning-claim-refutation structure within a week.
Learners independently apply critical thinking skills to complete language projects in mobile learning environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
